ubOperating: UB MARKET LTD – a Ukrainian-Bulgarian company specializing in international trade, export, and import of food products, including sunflower oil, beet sugar, chicken meat, milk, mayonnaise, and other food items. We act as a responsible intermediary, connecting leading manufacturers from various countries with wholesale buyers through road transport.
weGarantee: Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil, where we supply high-quality products directly from reliable manufacturers in a wide assortment: refined sunflower oil – bottled in 0.5/1/5/10 liters and in bulk (tankers), unrefined (crude) sunflower oil – in bulk (tankers).
aboutUsDescription: Our company supplies high-quality products and operates online, ensuring constant communication and support for our clients, focusing on building mutually beneficial and long-term relationships.
collaboration: Ukrainian-Bulgarian export-import company UB Market LTD, we invite you to collaborate!
ourProductsDescription: Discover our extensive selection of products, carefully curated to meet your needs. From high-quality essentials to exclusive items, explore a diverse range of options designed to offer you value and satisfaction.
exploreProducts: Explore our range of high-quality products
aboutUsTitle: UB MARKET LTD – a Ukrainian-Bulgarian company specializing in international trade, export, and import of food products, including sunflower oil, beet sugar, chicken meat, milk, mayonnaise, and other food items. We act as a responsible intermediary, connecting leading manufacturers from various countries with wholesale buyers through road transport.
ourMissionTitle: Our main specialization is international trade in sunflower oil, where we supply high-quality products directly from reliable manufacturers in a wide assortment: refined sunflower oil – bottled in 0.5/1/5/10 liters and in bulk (tankers), unrefined (crude) sunflower oil – in bulk (tankers).
ourVisionTitle: Our company supplies high-quality products and operates online, ensuring constant communication and support for our clients, focusing on building mutually beneficial and long-term relationships.
integrityTitle: We believe in transparency and honesty in every transaction.
qualityTitle: We never compromise on the quality of our products.
customerFocusTitle: We always prioritize the needs and satisfaction of our customers.
innovationTitle: We continuously seek ways to improve our products and services.
sustainabilityTitle: We are committed to environmentally friendly practices in all our operations.
ourHistoryTitle: Since our founding in 2020, UB Market LTD has grown from a small local supplier to a trusted partner for businesses across Europe. Our success is built on a foundation of hard work, dedication, and a passion for providing the best products in the market. Over the years, we've expanded our operations and diversified our product offerings, always keeping pace with the evolving needs of our customers.
ourTeamTitle: Behind UB Market LTD is a team of highly skilled professionals who are passionate about the food industry. Our team works tirelessly to source, inspect, and distribute products that meet the highest standards of quality and safety.
name: Name:
weWillCallYouBack: We will call you back. Leave your phone and email.
helpText: We’re here to help! Reach out to us for any inquiries, support, or feedback.
contactMetaDescription: Get in touch with UB Market for inquiries, support, and feedback. Find our contact information, office hours, and location.
contactMetaKeywords: Contact, UB Market, Support, Feedback, Location

stayConnected: Stay connected with us for updates and more.
